text: Fotbal Club Viitorul Constanța is a professional association football club from Ovidiu, Constanța County, Romania. They currently play in the Liga I. The club was founded in the summer of 2009 and began to play in the Liga III. It was founded by famous Romanian footballer Gheorghe Hagi. The club currently possesses the top youth facilities of any club in the country. They won the Liga III in the 2009-10 season. Also, their team colours are blue, white and black. == Honours == Liga III *Winners (1): 2009-10 == References == Category:Romanian football clubs Category:Constanța County Category:2009 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Romania
title: FC Viitorul Constanța
